layout.singingstanza: There is a name I love to hear, I love to sing its worth; It sounds like mu -- sic in mine ear, The sweet -- est name on earth. Oh, how I love Je -- sus, Oh, how I love Je -- sus, Oh, how I love Je -- sus, Be -- cause He first loved me!

lyrics.stanza: There is a name I love to hear, I love to sing its worth; It sounds like music in mine ear, The sweetest name on earth.
Oh, how I love Jesus, Oh, how I love Jesus, Oh, how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!
It tells me of a Savior's love, Who died to set me free; It tells me of His precious blood, The sinner's perfect plea.
It tells me what my Father hath, In store for every day, And though I tread a darksome path, Yields sunshine all the way.
It tells of One whose loving heart Can feel my deepest woe, Who in each sorrow bears a part That none can bear below.
